name: Bundle of Fireworks
desc: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 per stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage .
notes:
The Bundle of Fireworks is a returning item in Risk of Rain 2. It is unlocked and starts appearing in runs after completing the ...Maybe One More. Challenge.
When interacting with something (with the exception of Scrappers), the player launches 8 (+4 per stack) homing fireworks, each exploding in a 5m radius and dealing 300% damage with a proc coefficient of 0.2.  


== Notes ==
After interacting with something, fireworks rockets are launched one by one every 0.1 seconds, firing directly upwards.
Fireworks travel at 25 m/s, and accelerate at 2m/s.
Each fireworks rocket stops homing in on enemies after 8 seconds and will fall to the ground. If the rocket still has not hit anything after 16 seconds, it automatically explodes.
Critical chance is rolled upon activation. If the chance succeeds, all fireworks from that instance will deal critical damage.
The Bundle of Fireworks becomes substantially less useful with the Artifact of Sacrifice, since no Chests spawn.
This item cannot be obtained in the Simulacrum mode, and will appear locked if attempting to select it with the Artifact of Command.
Fireworks are affected by the  Pocket I.C.B.M.. Instead of launching 3 times as many rockets over a longer period, 3 rockets are launched at once every 0.1 seconds instead of the normal 1.


== Tips ==
The vending machine spawned by  Remote Caffeinator allows for easy, repeated use of the Bundle of Fireworks and  Squid Polyp while in boss arenas or other areas which do not typically have interactables.
Owing to its low proc coefficient, this item cannot reliably activate chance-based on-hit items like  Tri-Tip Dagger and  AtG Missile Mk. 1. To make the most out of this item, consider damage-increasing items that ignore proc coefficients entirely; these include  Lens-Maker's Glasses,  Delicate Watch,  Crowbar,  Armor-Piercing Rounds and  Brilliant Behemoth.
Special mention goes to the  Plasma Shrimp, not only for its ability to ignore proc coefficients entirely, but also for being affected by the  Pocket I.C.B.M. as well. The amount of fireworks will be tripled, and each firework will proc three missiles on hit, leading to exponential damage returns.


== Lore ==
"Hey, happy anniversary!

You really thought I forgot?

Ah, I thought I was the dumb one in our relationship. C'mon T, of course not! Well, I wasn't going to let a little alien death planet ruin our night. Right? Shh, just watch. Just watch. It's okay. Just watch. You'll love it - you really will. Then we can go home.

You can keep your eyes closed. Just listen. Ah - here it comes! In five... four... three... two... ONE...!"

== Trivia ==
In the Risk of Rain universe, fireworks were banned on Earth after terrorists disguised missiles as fireworks. They were later re-legalized, in 2054.
